name: Lawrence Best
description: More about me I am , single , I`m 5`11"am mentally stable, physically fit, a bunch of laughs, warm, caring, honest, good listening,and mostly God Fearing, and a positive person.I am real easy person to talk to and a good listener. I love to play golf ,I like going to the movies , or watching movies in my room , I like swimming ,listening to music and dance to any kind of music, traveling , going bowling and also a good cook.I am a family oriented person and ifThere is more, but it would be better for you to find some things out for yourself. Am looking for a woman that will be able to listen to me, communicate her feelings to me , make me laugh, hold and comfort each other in need,stand by ourselves, respect each other.
